channel.title: Is there a way
channel.description: to change the size of the crowns in a client...i have 3 pictures i want as crowns but they r 18x17.... and how do i make a certain crown go 2 just my username in the server(gethero)

item.title: Is there a way
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

oh its acualy realy easy first what you gota do is open the client up in paint go to like tools or something like that click attributes and make it 13 x 11. sometimes it will fuck up the crowns nothing you can do about it but download a differant crown. after you get the right crowns what you gota do is download a program called cache editor on the page for download or on another moparscape guide itll show you how to put the crowns in. hope this helped you

Read full topic
